meaningMnemonic: A <radical>Viking</radical> moves your <radical>mouth</radical> with his <radical>hand</radical> to <kanji>manipulate</kanji> it. He sticks his hand into your mouth. With the Viking's hand in your mouth, he can make you look like you’re saying anything he wants.
readingMnemonic: The Viking is manipulating you so that he can <kanji>manipulate</kanji> the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう)! You and the Shougun have grown pretty close over the last year or so, and this Viking is going to take advantage!
